footer_disclaimer: All rights reserved, no guarantees given. DeFi tools are not toys. Use at your own risk.

landing.intro_title: Alchemix Self-Repaying Loans allow you to leverage a range of tokens without risk of liquidation.
landing.intro_subtitle_0: Borrow up to 50% of your deposited collateral
landing.intro_subtitle_1: Spend and save at the same time
landing.short_explainer: By borrowing a synthetic version of the asset you deposit you'll avoid the risk of liquidation. Defi innovation on a whole new level, Alchemix is the first same-asset loan product in DeFi.
landing.short_explainer_end: Using your collateral we earn yield on your behalf to pay off your loan automagically!
landing.path_subtitle: A multi-functional account for all your financial needs
landing.benefit_leverage_blurb: Keep exposure to important assets while making them work for you. Leverage more of your wealth (without risk of liquidation!) by borrowing a synthetic version of your collateral.
landing.benefit_range_blurb: Alchemix is opening doors to new collateral types. Leverage more of your wealth than ever before.
landing.benefit_liquidations_blurb: No matter what happens we'll never liquidate your deposit. You can choose to self-liquidate your own loan at your own discretion.
landing.benefit_flexible_blurb: Alchemix doesn't lock your deposit or charge you fees. Your funds are accessible 100% of the time. You can also repay your debt whenever you like.

governance_page.title: Governance
governance_page.subtitle: Alchemix Improvement Proposals
governance_page.noOpenVotes: There are no open proposals at the moment.
governance_page.noTranslation: The results are fetched through external APIs and are not translated from their original language.

farm_page.title: Farms
farm_page.subtitle: Earn yield on your deposits
farm_page.saddle_text: Deposit alUSD, FEI, FRAX, and/or LUSD to earn ALCX, TRIBE, FXS and LQTY
farm_page.sushi_text: Deposit alUSD and ETH on Sushiswap to earn SUSHI

transmuter_page.title: Transmuter
transmuter_page.subtitle: Convert your synthetic tokens to their counterpart at a 1:1 ratio

vaults_page.title: Vaults
vaults_page.subtitle: Deposit collateral and borrow your future yield right away

small_screen.title: What is this? DeFi 2.0 for ants?
small_screen.message: Alchemix v2 does not yet support small screens. Please get a larger screen or resize your browser window.

toast.error_withdraw_amount: Trying to withdraw more than available
toast.error_claim_amount: Trying to claim more than available

modals.liq_disclaimer: I understand that liquidating will use my deposited collateral to repay the outstanding debt
modals.transfer_loan: Transfereix el préstec a un moneder diferent
modals.transfer_error: L'adreça proporcionada no és vàlida. Si us plau, comproveu l'entrada.
modals.transfer_disclaimer: He verificat que l'adreça anterior és el destinatari correcte del meu nou préstec
modals.slippage_below_safe: Tolerància al lliscament molt baixa, la transacció es podria revertir.
modals.slippage_above_max: Lliscament superior a la quantitat màxima possible.
modals.slippage_above_safe: Tolerància al lliscament molt alta, es poden produir pèrdues.

galcx.title: Embolcall gALCX
galcx.leading: Un embolcall líquid ALCX per fer staking d'un únic actiu.
galcx.p_1: Emboliqui el seu ALCX en gALCX i fes que el seu ALCX treballi per a tu a la piscina d'un únic actiu mentre manté el control del seu gALCX.
galcx.p_2: La reinversió automàtica augmenta la quantitat d'ALCX que te un gALCX quant es desembolica.

migration.title: Migració heretada
migration.liq_explain: El primer pas és liquidar el vostre deute pendent, si escau.
migration.wit_explain: El segon pas retira tot el vostre saldo de la V1.
migration.mig_explain: El tercer pas es proporcionar el vostre saldo a un nou dipòsit amb una ràtio de LTV del 50%.
migration.paragraph_1: Perquè sigui tan senzill com sigui possible migrar els vostres dipòsits antics a la V2, Alchemix ofereix una eina de migració que us permet transferir la vostra posició a la V2 d'una forma eficient en gas
migration.paragraph_2: El vostre moneder us demanarà unes quantes vegades que signeu transaccions que tinguin en compte els passos següents:
migration.from_alusd: Migrar la posició antiga de alUSD
migration.from_aleth: Migrar la posició antiga de alETH
migration.no_position: No s'han detectat posicions antigues, tot està bé!
migration.cus_explain: Trieu una quantitat que voleu per un préstec instantani (flashloan) per pasar-ho a una nova posició V2, així com l'import LTV desitjat que s'utilitzarà per determinar quant deute cal assumir per cada token creat.
